meanings.definition: Having little or no concern for oneself, especially with regard to fame, position, money, etc.
meanings.sent1: Her selflessness act of donating all her savings to charity touched many hearts.
meanings.sent2: His selflessness nature always put others' needs before his own.
meanings.sent3: The selflessness hero saved the day without expecting any reward.
meanings.sent4: The selflessness volunteer worked tirelessly for the community without seeking recognition.
meanings.sent5: The selflessness sacrifice of the soldier will be remembered forever.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being selfless; unselfishness.
meanings.sent1: The selflessness of the nurse was evident in her compassionate care for the patients.
meanings.sent2: His selflessness in sharing his lunch with a hungry classmate was heartwarming.
meanings.sent3: The selflessness of the dog sharing its toy with the new puppy was adorable.
meanings.sent4: Her selflessness in always putting others first was like a guiding light for her friends.
meanings.sent5: The selflessness of the teacher in helping struggling students inspired the whole class.
